subtitle: Reference materials about artificial intelligence for students
intro: The Student AI Hub provides reference materials about artificial intelligence designed for students. It includes organized sections covering core concepts, practical applications, and important considerations. These materials serve as a starting point for understanding AI and its role in academic and professional contexts.
